Vote for Pedro PERIOD

Its quite possibly the most popular Tshirt slogan of  PERIOD After first appearing in the movie Napoleon Dynamite the words have become an almost cultlike salute to the underdog PERIOD

The man who made Pedro famous  actor Efren Ramirez  paid a visit to the UW Monday night to speak before a screening of Napoleon Dynamite presented by the UW Film Club ASUW Arts and Entertainment and Student Activities and Union Facilities PERIOD

After a 20minute exhibition of UW student films Ramirez dressed in black and without the Pedro mustache fielded a few questions from students including one about rumors of a sequel to the popular independent film that made him famous overnight PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

But Ramirez didnt comment extensively on the rumor saying only that there had been 

Ramirez turned down a role in the  production of The Alamo to play Napolean Dynamites shy Hispanic friend who runs for student body president of their high school PERIOD

The Los Angeles resident has been acting most of his life but didnt find himself in the limelight until his portrayal of Napoleons mustachioed sidekick PERIOD

ASUW Arts and Entertainment and the UW Film Club were the ones who brought Ramirez to the University PERIOD Film Club director of development Greg Wylie had a moment to catch up with him between appearances PERIOD

 said Wylie PERIOD 

Onstage Ramirez was relaxed said Wylie PERIOD

 he said PERIOD
